DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine short long term safety effectiveness ustekinumab subject moderate severe chronic palmar plantar psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ustekinumab Patients With Moderate Severe Palmar Plantar Psoriasis
